## CRAN Packages

The below packages use extendr and are currently (as of `r format(Sys.Date())`)
published on CRAN.

```{r message=FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
readr::read_csv("cran-pkgs.csv") |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Description = stringr::str_squish(Description),
    URL = stringr::str_replace_all(URL, "\\r\\n", " ")
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(Package, Description, URL) |>
  dplyr::arrange(tolower(Package)) |>
  knitr::kable("simple")
```
